TopicTitle: cant wait for engine exaust to look like this

Articles.Content: i choose that vid because its like a simple ksp rocket

The exhaust effects were mentioned on last weeks KSP TV generally mentioning the age of system and its limitations

The intention is to update it (maybe tied up with the particle system) but unfortunately there's missing content which has priority
Yeah, content over visuals is the way most games work. BUT, those do look badass and if the matching KW engines had that . . . oh wow.

same thing that they use for re entry tweaked would work awesome for getting that sort of effect i think

but with everything squad do they will find a way cooler way of doing it that looks brill
Never make assumptions, just because you want something doesn't mean its going to happen. The KSP dev's have more important matters on their heads first.

The exhaust effects were mentioned on last weeks KSP TV generally mentioning the age of system and its limitations

The intention is to update it (maybe tied up with the particle system) but unfortunately there's missing content which has priority

I suggested it be mentioned
Looks like the worlds biggest linear aerospike from the side.
